committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution to provide for the designation of February 20 of each year as Postal Employees Day.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to issue a proclamation designating February 20 of each year as "Postal Employees Day."

titles.title: Joint resolution to provide for the designation of February 20 of each year as Postal Employees Day.
